title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping          Lodging Lodging is not available at the memorial, but nearby communities offer plenty of options.         Camping Numerous opportunities for camping are available throughout the area surrounding Mount Rushmore, however, camping is not permitted within the boundaries of Mount Rushmore National Memorial.         Restaurants Mount Rushmore National Memorial offers one restaurant on site, the Carver's Cafe, operated by Xanterra Parks and Resorts.
